instructions.ar: تابع يمينا باتجاه قليلا نحو Destination 1
instructions.eo: Pluu ete dekstren direkte al Destination 1
instructions.es: Continúa levemente a la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Continúa ligeramente por la derecha hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Continuer légèrement à droite en direction de Destination 1
instructions.he: המשך בנטייה קלה ימינה לכיוון Destination 1
instructions.hu: Hajtson tovább enyhén jobbra a Destination 1 irányába
instructions.id: Tetap agak di kanan menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Continua leggermente a destra verso Destination 1
instructions.ja: Destination 1に向けて斜め右方向に進む
instructions.my: Destination 1ဆီသို့ညာဘက်အနည်းငယ်ဆက်သွားပါ
instructions.no: Fortsett litt mot høyre mot Destination 1
instructions.pl: Kontynuuj łagodnie w prawo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Continue ligeiramente à direita sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Continue ligeiramente à direita em direção a Destination 1
instructions.ro: Continuați ușor la dreapta spre Destination 1
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните направо в направлении Destination 1
instructions.sl: Nadaljujte rahlo desno v smeri proti Destination 1
instructions.sv: Fortsätt med lätt högersväng mot Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametinde hafif sağda devam et
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь плавно праворуч у напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên phải về Destination 1
instructions.yo: Tẹsiwaju die-die si ọna ọtun Destination 1
